H13434dH4.description: Current shaft position in the [0; 1] range. Note, this is the value the servo strives to be at, it may be inequal to the current physical shaft position.
H13434dH4.label: VAL

H1vgFZBYE.description: Pulses when the position is updated
H1vgFZBYE.label: DONE

@/position-value.description: Extracts the current target position value from the servo device

B1lXALNOS4.description: The target shaft rotation position in the [0; 1] range. The real angle/pulse values corresponding to the 0 and 1 boundaries are defined by the servo device node.
B1lXALNOS4.label: VAL

S1Q7C8NdBV.description: Set the new target rotation value for the given device.
S1Q7C8NdBV.label: DO

S1wmRINuHV.description: Pulses to acknowledge the new target. It will take time for the servo to complete the order.
S1wmRINuHV.label: ACK

@/rotate.description: Rotates a servo shaft to the given angular position.

S1MzssyLr.description: Makes the servo react to incoming values while `ACT` is true
S1MzssyLr.label: ACT

@/servo.description: Quickstart hardware control node for hobby RC servos.

HkvdPw4S4.description: The target shaft rotation position in the [0; 1] range. The real angle/pulse values corresponding to the 0 and 1 boundaries are defined by the servo device node.
HkvdPw4S4.label: VAL

S1n9Yv4r4.description: Defines the desired rate of rotation: amount of `VAL` change per second. To achieve correctness should be lower than the rated servo shaft rotation speed.
S1n9Yv4r4.label: RATE

Sykbxl5Y4.description: The mutex which will be tried to be locked before the rotation. If the lock acquisition fails, the rotation will not start. The mutex is released when rotation completes. Leave unconected if the servo is not controlled by multiple nodes.
Sykbxl5Y4.label: MUX

r11svP4H4.description: Set the new target rotation value for the given device.
r11svP4H4.label: DO

ryCUDDES4.description: Emits a pulse when the rotation is complete. Will pulse at the right moment only if `RATE` is lower than the real servo speed.
ryCUDDES4.label: DONE

@/rotate-slow.description: Rotates a servo shaft to the given angular position with the rate specified.

ByJ9IwVBV.description: The minimal rated pulse width (in S)
ByJ9IwVBV.label: Pmin

H15qLDVSE.description: The maximal rated pulse width (in S)
H15qLDVSE.label: Pmax

HyNOLPVB4.description: The board port the servo is connected to
HyNOLPVB4.label: PORT

@/servo-device.description:
Represents an RC hobby servo device

Possible errors:
 Invalid port

description: Nodes to control RC hobby servos
name: servo
